title: Pavarotti: The Last Tenor (DVD, AVI rip)
description:
Acclaimed tenor Luciano Pavarotti prepares for retirement in this intimate BBC documentary narrated by Sir Ian McKellen.  As his career draws to a close and he tours the world giving his final performances, the seventy-year-old Pavarotti reflects on his life and times and just what means to be one of the world&#039;s greatest tenors. ~ Jason Buchanan, All Movie Guide

Includes clips of Pavarotti&#039;s earliest performances of Tosca, La Boheme, Rigoletto, and more.

DVD Release Date: September 13, 2005
Run Time: 88 minutes
Includes Subtitles
